document_data.name: Macaw
document_data.mainbody: '''Macaw''' was a species of a loud and brightly-colored [[parrot]] found in the jungles and hot humid forests in [[South Faerûn]] and on the continent of [[Maztica]].
document_data.Description: Macaws were renowned for their loud colors and the ability to memorize and imitate [[humanoid]] speech. Like other parrots, they had strong claws and beaks used for climbing and their toes allowed the birds to handle small objects.{{Cite dragon/84/A cast of strange familiars|16}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1361}}, a Maztican deity [[Qotal]] used talking macaws to guide his chosen [[cleric]] [[Erixitl]] during the period of war between the conquistadors of [[Amn]] and the men of the [[True World]], corrupted by [[Lolth]]'s shadowy manipulations and the cruel god of war [[Zaltec]].
